about_the_game:
TREADNAUTS OST
Forged in the sensory deprivation chamber at Dreamland.
- King Felix

01_Tank to the Skies.mp3 [1:34]
02_Pilot Loop.mp3 [0:59]
03_Rust Valley.mp3 [4:20]
04_Dreamland.mp3 [3:20]
05_Salt Harbor.mp3 [4:00]
06_Wave District.mp3 [3:52]
07_Target Tension.mp3 [1:30]
08_Until Next Time.mp3 [2:26]

Songs will be placed in your Treadnauts folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Treadnauts\OST

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Treadnauts Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Treadnauts OST: you heard it here first. - King Felix
